hercpanorama 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Extract text from a csv-formatted student-level file output from Panorama

import_raw_report.Rd

The table will have at least 10 columns of demographic and identifying data:

  • Student Student Number <int>

  • Student First Name <chr>

  • Student Last Name <chr>

  • Gender <chr>

  • 504 Status <chr>

  • ELL Status <chr>

  • Grade Level <chr>

  • Date of Birth <date>

  • Race Ethnicity <chr>

  • Special ED Status <chr>

Usage

import_raw_report(.filename)

Arguments

.filename

<chr> the full path to the file

Value

a tibble of student-level data.
